title: I, Partridge: We Need to Talk About Alan
description: Journalist, presenter, broadcaster, husband, father, vigorous Alan Partridge. Star of action blockbuster Alpha Papa; a man with a fascinating past and an amazing future.I We Need To Talk About Alan is the memoir of Alan Partridge, the nation’s favourite broadcaster. It is a work of heart-breaking majesty.Genuinely one of the best books of the last fifteen to twenty years, I, Partridge charts the highs, lows and middle bits in the life of one of Europe’s most revered inquisitors.
author: Alan Partridge
